mapper.insert: insert into boardimginfo (file_unique_name, file_real_name, file_size, file_extension, file_upload_folder, file_upload_time) values (#{fileUniqueName}, #{fileRealName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileUploadFolder}, #{fileUploadTime});
mapper.select: select file_real_name, file_extension, file_upload_folder from boardimginfo where file_unique_name = #{fileUniqueName};
